FORGOT.PAGE_HINT: Forgot your account password? Reset them by entering the email address to which your account is assigned below (or the contact email if you have provided it). An email with a password reset link will be sent to the provided address.

LOGIN.FORGOT_PASSWORD_LINK: Have you forgotten your password? Reset them here
LOGIN.PAGE_TITLE: Log in to the CIOB portal
LOGIN.REGISTER_LINK: You dont have an account yet? Register new here!

AFFILIATION.CITY_HINT: Enter the name of the city in which your institution is located
AFFILIATION.COUNTRY_HINT: Select the country of your institution
AFFILIATION.DEPARTMENT_HINT: Enter the name of your department
AFFILIATION.INSTITUTION_HINT: Enter the name of your institution
AFFILIATION.STREET_HINT: Enter the street where your institution is located
AFFILIATION.TITLE: academic title

AFTER.PAGE_DESC1: We have sent an activation email to the
AFTER.PAGE_DESC2: Check your e-mail account and follow the instructions in the e-mail sent. If you have not received the e-mail, check the SPAM folder or send the e-mail again using the link below

ALERTS.BIRTHDATE_INCORRECT: The date format is not valid. Correct: 06/08/1980
ALERTS.EMAIL_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists
ALERTS.EMAIL_NOT_EXISTS: An account with this email does not exist.
ALERTS.PASSWORD_LENGTH: The password cannot contain less than 8 characters

REGISTER.EMAIL_HINT: The email will be used to log in and receive notifications
REGISTER.LOGIN_LINK: Do you already have an account? Log in here!
REGISTER.PASSWORD_HINT: The password should be at least 8 characters long

RESET.PAGE_DESC: Enter the new password for your account in the field below.
RESET.RESETED_DESC: Your password has been successfully reset. You can login now.

LOGIN.NO_EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
